cause.description:
A group dedicated to spreading the word of Marx across the world, and free the workers and proletariat from the capitalists. Soon we will bring the class structure we live in crashing down.
1. The Spread Of Communism
2. The destruction of the class system we live in
3. To replace the capitalist system with a more friendly system
cause.mission: Spread the Glory of the Revalution to the world
cause.name: Communism International
